name: Galaxy Marauders
description:
After decrypting the intel he obtained from Escape from Santcore, Brando now knows what he must do to stop the invasive Marauders once and for all.

Play in two different modes; 

Wave mode (the campaign mode) involves Brando taking on waves of Marauder ships to get to the Marauder Capital Ship. Blow it up to win.

Endless mode tests your survival skills and how many enemies you can take down.
